text: The University of Florida (UF) is a public university in Gainesville, Florida, US. The campus is 2,000 acres and has more than 900 structures, as well as other locations in the state of Florida. Important research activities at the university are in medicine, at Shands Hospital, and in agriculture. The mascot of UF is an alligator, and students and fans of the university's athletic teams are often called "Gators." ==References== Category:Association of American Universities Category:Oak Ridge Associated Universities Category:Southeastern Conference Category:1853 establishments in Florida
title: University of Florida
